name: Din!
greetingText: You're one of the most important people in my life
wishText: I hope your wishes come true! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday!! I love you so much, you're the best
text2: That would've been a bit underwhelming to do
text4: Why not do something different? Something...
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
